div.bibl: The Greek Press, Sept. , 1929THE FIRST FALL DANCE

body.p: Chicago Greeks are getting ready for the first fall dance being given by the young ladies of the North Side chapter. The literary Club of the Young Women of Chicago is the first organization by our young ladies and always gives us a successful dance. This years annual dance will be given September 27, at the Illinois Women's Athletic Club, 820 Tower court. Let us help the young ladies and another success to their ever-growing chain.
